thread.title: Outraged Buyer
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by Outraged Buyer

author: Outraged Buyer
title: Outraged Buyer
text: I have been a long time NFM customer. I lived in Nebraska, and now reside in Texas. Recently I purchased a Kitchen-Aid combination unit amongst other things. The unit is faulty, have had 6 repair people are out, and the disconnect between NFM and Kitchen-Aid is comical at best. I've had NFM call me promising a new unit, then turn around and say they have no record of that call. THEY CALLED ME!!! I have talked with supervisors who promise to call me back, and then do not do so. I once held them in high esteem and now because of Erica's incompetence I have lost faith.
